Interface IMainDirectoryService

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract

Interface to service collection of IMainDirectory objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IMainDirectoryService
Implementations: MainDirectoryService

ReadByMergedFileId(int)

Gets, from the stored collection of objects, elements with the specified merged file identifier.

List<IMainDirectory> ReadByMergedFileId(int mergedFileId)

Parameters

mergedFileId int

The searched merged file identifier.

Returns

List<IMainDirectory>

The list of objects with the specified merged file identifier. If there is no objects with equal mergedFileId, returned list is empty.
